answers.answer: Nothing was attached. If patients are overweight they can get diabetes after treatment. Also, some patients have autoimmune problems. Not everyone is the same, just as the side effects are not the same for all. A few patients get liver cancer.
If I am reading this the way you wrote it, it appears that you think that Hep C does not cause Cryo or Neuropathy? If not, where and how do these diseases appear along with the Hep C?SJL
